___cluster_id.description: Id of the cluster that the server belongs to.

___storage_osd_disks.description: If server has storage-compute role, specify list of disks that are used for storage.

___storage_chassis_id.description: If server has storage-compute role this field should contain value of storage chassis id. This value along with server id and configuration from other storage-compute nodes is used to calculate storage_chassis_config

___storage_repo_id.description: If server has storage compute or master role configured, the storage repo id should be specified. mandatory if storage role is configured. SM does not calculate the value.

___partition.description: Disk name on which to install the OS. Only this disk will be part of the LVM. By default ALL disks on the node will be part of the LVM.

___ipmi_username.description: The username to login to IPMI interface

___package_image_id.description: Id of Contrail package that the server will be provisioned with.

___ipmi_address.description: Address of the IPMI Interface for this server (if available)

___management_interface.description: The name of the interface to be set as the management interface for this server

___interfaces.description: Description of the interface config for this server

___ipmi_password.description: The password to login to IPMI interface

___domain.description: The domain that the server belongs to.

___base_image_id.description: Id of base image OS that the server will be reimaged with.

___id.description: The id of the server. Mandatory
